  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020406</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020406</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Busca a los griegos</string>
            <string language="en">Find the Greeks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie den Griechen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez les Grecs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre os gregos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi i Greci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε τους Έλληνες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad para buscar nombres de héroes griegos participantes en la Guerra de Troya.</string>
            <string language="en">An activity which asks the students to find the names of Greek heroes participating in the war of Troy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Busca griegos</string>
            <string language="en">Greek word search</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grecolatina</string>
            <string language="en">Graeco-Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität, die die Kursteilnehmer bittet, 
die Namen der griechischen Helder zu finden, die am Krieg von Troy 
teilnehmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité qui demande aux étudiants de 
trouver les noms des héros grecs participant à la guerre de 
Troy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade que peça que os estudantes 
encontrem os nomes dos heróis gregos que participam na guerra de 
Troy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività che chiede agli allievi di trovare i
nomi degli eroi greci che partecipano alla guerra di Troy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα που ζητά από τους σπουδαστές για να 
βρεί τα ονόματα των ελληνικών ηρώων που συμμετέχουν στον πόλεμο 
του τρόυ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechische Wortsuche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graeco-Römisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche grecque de mot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graeco-Romain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Busca grega da palavra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Graeco-graeco-Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca greca di parola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Graeco-Romano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνική αναζήτηση λέξης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραεθο-ρωμαϊκά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
